name: quantms-dia-proteomics
title: DIA Proteomics Quantification (nf-core/quantms)
description: Data-independent acquisition (DIA) proteomics analysis with label-free quantification. Supports DDA-LFQ, DDA-ISO, and DIA-LFQ workflows for comprehensive proteomic profiling.
content:
Mass Spectrometry Quantification (quantms)

The nf-core/quantms pipeline provides comprehensive proteomics quantification supporting DDA (data-dependent) and DIA (data-independent) acquisition methods with multiple labeling strategies.

Supported Acquisition Methods

  • DDA-LFQ: Data-dependent label-free quantification
  • DDA-ISO: Data-dependent isobaric labeling (TMT, iTRAQ)
  • DIA-LFQ: Data-independent label-free quantification (SWATH-MS)

Scientific Applications

  • Clinical Proteomics: Biomarker discovery in patient samples
  • Drug Discovery: Target identification and validation
  • Systems Biology: Comprehensive protein expression profiling
  • Post-translational Modifications: PTM identification and quantification
  • Comparative Proteomics: Differential abundance analysis
  • Precision Medicine: Personalized protein signatures

Pipeline Features

  • Multiple Search Engines: Comet, MSGF+, and more
  • DIA Analysis: DIA-NN for data-independent workflows
  • Statistical Analysis: MSstats for differential abundance
  • PTM Localization: Modification site assignment
  • Quality Control: Comprehensive QC metrics
  • Flexible Input: RAW and mzML formats

Input Requirements

  • SDRF File: Sample-to-data relationship format (TSV)
  • Protein Database: UniProt FASTA file
  • Raw Data: RAW or mzML mass spectrometry files

Key Outputs

  • Protein Quantification: Abundance matrices
  • Peptide Identifications: PSM-level results
  • Differential Abundance: Statistical comparisons
  • PTM Sites: Localized modifications
  • QC Reports: Comprehensive quality metrics

Perfect for: Clinical proteomics • Drug discovery • Biomarker research • DIA-MS • Isobaric labeling
